text: Suddenly, as predestined by an invisible force, the car responded to another intention, headed toward an unpredictable destination, without my futile efforts succeeding in diverting the direction to return to the direction I had set. We walked like this, in the night and mystery, in horror and fatalism, without me being able to do anything to oppose myself. The other being stopped the engine, right there in a desolate place. Someone who wasn't there before, pointed me from the back seat with the relentless cold of a gun. And his definitive voice, he sentenced me. Prepare yourself for the end of this story! FIN
title: Final
author: Edmundo Valadés
